QuestData.Title: Lady Of Da Tigers
QuestData.Description: Remember de frogs ya made into me eyes and ears? Well, dey've found somethin' interestin'.$B$BOn an island to de southeast, dey've spied a tiger even de other cats seem to fear. Dis tiger, I've never seen anythin' like it.$B$BIt hunts wit' da instincts of a cat, but de mind of a person. It could be a powerful spirit and a strong ally.$B$BI'll be callin' down the spirit o' the tiger upon ya. Use its gifts to locate this cat and challenge it. See if ya can win its aid in our battle for the isles.
QuestData.LogDescription: While imbued with the Spirit of the Tiger, lure the Tiger Matriarch out of hiding and use your new abilities to best it in combat.
QuestData.RewardText: Vanira's frogs be tellin' de truth, den? Dis tiger be a druid and an ally? We couldn't be hopin' for a better outcome. Dis be a good omen for de coming battle.
